entries.journal_entry_description: Take critical information about the Empire to the Rebel base in Northwest Corellia.
entries.journal_entry_title: Bring Information to the Rebel Base.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the trench near the broken bridge and find the Imperial defector.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Looks like the defector won't follow you.  Talk to him and find out why.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Do these soldiers grow on trees?! You were attacked by hired mercenaries a third time.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Bring the Imperial defector's codephrase to Teslo Ten'doora in the Rebel Base.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Bring Imperial Defector's Codephrase to Rebel Base
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: You successfully brought the Imperial defector to the rebel base.  You have been rewarded with 5000 credits and Rebel faction.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You were attacked by several hired soldiers.
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: You have 20 minutes to get the codephrase up to Teslo Ten'doora.
